medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment by which the sender uniquely identifies the declaration by means of its type and number and when necessary its function.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying dates and, and when relevant, time for the whole message. If the function of the message is to modify or to delete a previous message, the date and time of modification or deletion must be specified.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment providing an additional reference relating to this message and if necessary, the reference of a previous message that has been modified or deleted.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying parties involved in the transmission.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment identifying names of parties and their functions regarding the exchange of the message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references of the message for the relating party identified in the previous PNA segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying the person or the department to whom the communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication type and number for the contact specified in the previous CTA segment, if CTA is not present the contact is the party specified in the previous PNA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying parties identified in the previous PNA segment.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment identifying the address of the relating party.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
FTX, A segment providing additional text information to the previous ADR segment.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

medi:segment.name: Section control
medi:segment.medi:documentation: UNS, A mandatory service segment placed before the first user segment in the detail section to avoid segment collision.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: CTA-COM-SG4-SG5-SG6 A group of segments giving all required information relating to a company or a person and, if relevant, for all of its local units, responsible for declared information.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment giving the identity of an employer responsible for the production of the message or the person who receives wages or an advantage from the employer.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment providing any additional information with regard to the name of the employer or the person who receives wages or an advantage from the employer (e.g. if the length of a name exceeds the available number of characters within the PNA).

medi:segment.name: Person demographic information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PDI, A segment indicating the marital status of a person.

medi:segment.name: Relationship
medi:segment.medi:documentation: REL, A segment indicating a hierarchical relationship inside a company (e.g. headquarter, local units) or a relation between two declared persons.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment providing any relating dates regarding the person or the employer (e.g. date of birth for the described person).

medi:segment.name: Nationality
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAT, A segment giving the nationality of an employer responsible for the production of the message or the concerned person.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment providing place of birth of the person described.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment indicating the bank account of an employee.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment specifying any personal attributes regarding the person described.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, A segment indicating the main activity of the employer or the person who receives wages or an advantage from an employer.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment giving the total of amounts concerning a wage earner charges paid by the employer (e.g. salaries, fees, etc). It also indicates the reference level salary that is used for contribution of a natural person, and any amounts registered for a particular person who receives wages or an advantage from the employer.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment giving any total for each type of amounts or quantities regarding each wage earner (e.g. number of full time workers, number of working days, etc) and totals for each type of amount or quantities regarding an employer.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying the person or department responsible of the declaration or concerned by the declaration may be contacted.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type and number for the person or the department identified in the previous CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments specifying additional references related to the employer or the person and associated dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying additional references related to the employer or the described person.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating dates and time, if necessary, relating to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments giving information about pertinent addresses of employer and concerned persons.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment indicating an address relating to the employer or the person concerned by the declaration.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying additional information regarding the address of the employer or the concerned person.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: SG8-SG9-SG10 A group of segments describing a contract or a procedure regarding wage earners in which the employer is involved. It may also detail any contract or procedure available for a particular person concerned by the Social administrative message.

medi:segment.name: Process identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRC, A segment identifying a contract or a procedure that involves the employer or a particular person who receives wages or an advantage from an employer.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment providing textual information relating to the contract or the procedure concerning the person or the employer.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment providing any attribute relating to the contract or the procedure described in the previous PRC segment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating dates, and relevant times, regarding the contract and the procedure identified in the previous PRC segment.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, A segment indicating the employment or employer details as described in the contract or the procedure.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment identifying address applying to the contract or the procedure.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment indicating requested documents to be provided to apply the contract or the procedure.

medi:segment.name: Index details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IND, A segment indicating index of an employee regarding a particular procedure.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment indicating the status of an advantage received by an employee.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment giving a location regarding the procedure identified in the previous PRC segment (e.g. location of an accident).

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments indicating quantities and dates regarding an employee, for example: the number of working days during a given period.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment specifying quantities and dates regarding the contract or the procedure.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying date and time relating to quantities.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments identifying reference(s) relating to the contract or the procedure and the corresponding period of validity.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying any reference(s) relating to the contract or the procedure and the corresponding period of validity.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the period of validity of the referenced contract or procedure.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment specifying indicators relating to a specific reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments specifying for a given contract or procedure amounts and related references and dates.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying an amount and amount type basis relating to the contract or the procedure.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment indicating references relating to an amount.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indication relating dates or periods of payment (e.g. last month of payment, date of payment, etc) relating to the previous MOA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments specifying any related percentages or related amounts regarding the contract or the procedure.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying a percentage that applies to the contract or the procedure.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments identifying an amount and relating periods for which a percentage applies.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment indicating amounts for which the percentage is available.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating periods relating to the previous amounts.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments specifying the details of authentication.

medi:segment.name: Authentication result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AUT, A segment specifying the details of authentication.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date and when necessary, the time of authentication.
